Package trafficsimulator.simulator.interfaces

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JsonMapDataGenerator
    Interface responsible for generating map data for client in json format
    SignalProgramControl
    Interface for controlling of signal programs of simulation
    SimulationControl
    Interface for outer communication with simulator
    StatisticsControl
    Interface responsible for saving adn retrieving statistical data of simulation
    TrafficActuationControl
    Interface responsible for controlling traffic actuation in the simulation
    VehicleGenerationControl
    Interface responsible for controlling vehicle operations from the simulation control
